code_map.8: Other (include toll roads not otherwise indicated or identified above)

code_map.0: Inventory route is not on the Base Network
code_map.1: Inventory route is on the Base Network
Toll bridge – toll paid to use the structure
code_map.2: On toll road – toll paid to the overall facility
code_map.3: On free road – toll-free structure and highway
code_map.4: Interstate toll segment under Secretarial Agreement
code_map.5: Toll bridge under separate Secretarial Agreement

code_map.12: Urban - Principal Arterial: Other Freeways or Expressways

code_map.pre_seismic: built before modern seismic design standards (pre-1970)
code_map.early_seismic: built during the early seismic design era (1970–1989)
code_map.modern_seismic: built under modern seismic design practices (1990–2007)
code_map.high_ductility: built under contemporary high-ductility seismic codes (2008+)

TRAFFIC_LANES_ON_028A.category: Number of traffic lanes on structure

code_map.none: Number of lanes on the structure not recorded
code_map.standard: carries a standard multi-lane roadway (3–4 lanes)
code_map.wide: carries a wide multi-lane roadway (5–6 lanes)
code_map.very_wide: carries a very wide roadway (7+ lanes)

TRAFFIC_LANES_UND_028B.category: Number of traffic lanes under structure

code_map.none: no roadway passes beneath the structure
code_map.very_narrow_under: crosses over a very narrow roadway (1–2 lanes)
code_map.narrow_under: crosses over a narrow roadway (3–4 lanes)
code_map.moderate_under: crosses over a moderate-width roadway (5–8 lanes)
code_map.wide_under: crosses over a wide roadway (9–12 lanes)
code_map.very_wide_under: crosses over a very wide roadway (13+ lanes)

code_map.very_narrow: a very narrow approach roadway (0–6 m)
code_map.very_wide: a very wide approach roadway (over 25 m)

code_map.99: Major variation in skews of substructure units

code_map.major: major skew variation across substructure units (coded as 99)

Does not meet standards or required but not provided

code_map.3: Possibly eligible or on state/local historic register

code_map.moderate: a moderate navigation vertical clearance (10–20 m)

OPEN_CLOSED_POSTED_041.category: Structure open, posted, or closed status

code_map.B: Open, posting recommended but not legally implemented
code_map.D: Open, would be posted or closed except for temporary shoring, etc.
code_map.E: Open, temporary structure in place while original is closed
code_map.G: New structure not yet open to traffic
code_map.P: Posted for load (may include temporary load restrictions)
code_map.R: Posted for other restrictions (speed, number of vehicles, etc.)

PERCENT_ADT_TRUCK_109.category: Percentage of ADT that is truck traffic

code_map.0: Not part of the national network for trucks
code_map.1: Part of the national network for trucks

code_map.4: Protection in place but re-evaluation suggested

code_map.U: Unknown foundation – not evaluated for scour (plan of action required)
code_map.T: Bridge over tidal waters – not evaluated but considered low risk
code_map.9: Foundations on dry land well above flood elevation
code_map.8: Foundations stable – scour above top of footing (resists scour or countermeasures in place)
code_map.7: Countermeasures installed – risk mitigated; plan of action implemented
code_map.5: Foundations stable – scour within limits of footing or piles
code_map.4: Foundations stable but action required to protect exposed foundations
code_map.3: Scour critical – unstable foundations for assessed/calculated conditions
code_map.2: Scour critical – extensive scour; foundations unstable by observation or evaluation
code_map.1: Scour critical – imminent pier/abutment failure, bridge closed to traffic
code_map.0: Scour critical – bridge failed and closed to traffic

code_map.very_high: very high future traffic volume (100k–200k ADT)
code_map.extremely_high: extremely high future traffic volume (>200k ADT)

code_map.F: Fair condition – lowest NBI rating between 5 and 6

code_map.very_small: a very small deck area (<200 m²)
code_map.very_large: a very large deck area (>7000 m²)
